SidekickBenefitsText.SourceString: Sidekicks benefit from Evolution but not other upgrades.
SidekickBenefitsText.LocalizedString: Sidekicks benefit from Evolution but not other upgrades.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: Attack is how much damage a basic attack will do to an enemy with no defenses.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: Attack is how much damage a basic attack will do to an enemy with no defenses.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: After taking a turn, heroes will be unable to act for a number of turns as they cool down.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: After taking a turn, heroes will be unable to act for a number of turns as they cool down.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: Incoming attacks are reduced by the defense stat.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: Incoming attacks are reduced by the defense stat.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: Health reflects how much damage a hero can take before passing out, and is regenerated at a slow rate on hero color matches.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: Health reflects how much damage a hero can take before passing out, and is regenerated at a slow rate on hero color matches.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: Mana is used to perform special attacks and regenerates slowly on color matches.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: Mana is used to perform special attacks and regenerates slowly on color matches.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: Each time a hero acts they contribute to the pet charge meter. When it is full you can summon your pet.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: Each time a hero acts they contribute to the pet charge meter. When it is full you can summon your pet.

TooltipBodyText.SourceString: Shows the total statistical strength of a hero. Does not consider effectiveness of their skills.
TooltipBodyText.LocalizedString: Shows the total statistical strength of a hero. Does not consider effectiveness of their skills.

Text.SourceString:
<RT.DefaultSkillText>Front Row: Attack target 3 times for </><RT.Good>60%</><RT.DefaultSkillText> ATK and disable reflexes for 4 turns.</>
<RT.DefaultSkillText>Back Row: Attack target and 3 random targets for </><RT.Good>60%</><RT.DefaultSkillText> ATK. Increase team's chance to dodge by 10% for 4 turns (max +20%).</>

<RT.DefaultSkillText>Front Row: Attack target 3 times for </><RT.Good>60%</><RT.DefaultSkillText> ATK and disable reflexes for 4 turns.</>
